snippet.title: Official Trailer - Carpathian Survival
snippet.description:
Official Trailer

Coming Soon in the #EpicGamesStore

https://linktr.ee/carpathiansurvival

Carpathian Survival epitomizes the essence of a survival game, one grounded in a realm of heightened realism. Within this immersive experience, you possess the ability to chop trees, mine stones or iron, swim, engage in the pursuit of wildlife, or find yourself pursued by untamed animals. The intricacies extend to foraging for herbs and wild berries amidst an environment that faithfully mirrors the nuances of real-world weather patterns and seasonal transitions. To stave off the chill of winter, the construction of a shelter becomes imperative for your continued well-being.
